Introduction
This topic contains information on the methods ROs and VA medical facilities use to exchange information, including
definition of hospitalization
methods of exchanging information
use of
VA Form 10-7131, Exchange of Beneficiary Information and Request for Administrative and Adjudicative Action
use of
VA Form 10-7132, Status Change
automated reporting of admissions and discharges
protection of information accessed through the Compensation and Pension Record Interchange (CAPRI)
, and
administration of CAPRI user accounts
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A  - Reports of Hospitalization and Other Information Exchanges Between Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Regional Offices (ROs) and Medical Facilities
citation: Part X, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
